document.full_text: the federal judge presiding over barry bonds's perjury case ruled that jurors' names will be kept confidential to protect them from being contacted or harassed by reporters or the public.
document.title: sports briefing | baseball: jurors' names to be kept secret in bonds case
lines_and_colors: the federal judge presiding over barry bonds's perjury case ruled that jurors' names will be kept confidential to protect them from being contacted or harassed by reporters or the public.
